snippet: A roundup of awards news from the Visual Effects Society and the National Film Critics Society, and a look at the British voting bloc of the Academy.
abstract: A roundup of awards news from the Visual Effects Society and the National Film Critics Society, and a look at the British voting bloc of the Academy.
lead_paragraph: 4:32 p.m. | Updated If you thought the explosions, chase scenes and animatronics in this year's movies were more eye-popping than usual, you're not alone. The folks at the Visual Effects Society, which released its nominations today, were also impressed.

headline.main: Visual Effects Pros Have Their Say; So Do Critics and the British
